item.description: Structure Fire; INC#0388; 08:24AM; 3141 W 78th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hvPhM0; Hyde Park; Firefighters arrived to a one story, single family dwelling with smoke showing. Further investigation discovered a detached garage with obvious signs of a explosion (cause unknown at this time). One person was located in the vicinity of the home with burn injuries but is not cooperating with firefighters/paramedics for evaluation. There is no active fire but crews will be overhauling the structure to ensure no smoldering hot spots remain. Building and Safety is responding for the evaluation and occupancy determination of the structure. So Cal Gas is responding to assist in the investigation. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. 9-1-1 call was received at 8:03AM. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E294 E57 E66 E94 RA257 RA57 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0318; 07:34AM; 1338 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ka23fA; Arlington Heights; KNOCKDOWN: The first alarm (36 firefighters) extinguished the fire (prior to the arrival of the additional resources) in 15 minutes. One adult patient was transported to the hospital with burn injuries (condition/age/gender unknown at this time). A primary and secondary search found no other occupants. Firefighters contained the fire to the unit of origin, defending the attached units. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM22 E13 E203 E211 E226 E229 E26 E29 E294 E3 E68 E94 EM11 HR3 RA26 RA29 RA826 T11 T26 T29 T3 T94 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0318; 07:19AM; 1338 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ka23fA; Arlington Heights; Story story, four-plex with heavy smoke showing on the 2nd floor. One additional task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E226 E229 E26 E29 RA26 RA826 T26 T29; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1351; 06:21PM; 4086 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vs0qWc; Historic South-Central; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters extinguished the fire in 31 minutes with no injuries reported. The rapid deployment of large diameter handlines to defend the exposed buildings successfully prevented the fire from extending into the exposed structures although there is exterior damage. The two (vacant) single family dwellings were fully involved. LAFD Arson investigators are responding for the cause investigation. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 E10 E13 E15 E203 E209 E21 E210 E215 E221 E233 E3 E66 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA14 RA814 RA815 RA846 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T3 T33 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1351; 05:50PM; 4086 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vs0qWc; Historic South-Central; One story (vacant), single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. Firefighters are in a transitional mode in property protection profile. There are two structures exposed. Additional resources were requested. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E10 E15 E21 E215 E221 E66 RA14 RA846 SQ21 T15 T21; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Physical Rescue - FATALITY; INC#1155; 04:19PM; 4700 N Tujunga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pq8dQD; North Hollywood; The adult male patient extricated from under the trailer was sadly beyond medical help and determined deceased on scene. Any further media inquires are directed to LAPD Inc# 3075 or LA County Coroner. No further details.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 T60 T78 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Physical Rescue ; INC#1155; 04:00PM; 4700 N Tujunga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pq8dQD; North Hollywood; One patient was extricated from under a trailer (attached to a pick up truck) and is being evaluated for treatment / transport by paramedics. Age/gender/condition are unknown at this time. ; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E278 E60 E86 EM14 HR3 RA60 RA86 T60 T78 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0286; 06:51AM; 5420 N Nagle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M4RITX; Sherman Oaks; KNOCKDOWN: 81 firefighters extinguished the fire in one hour and 12 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters will continue to overhaul and address any remaining smoldering areas. LAFD Arson investigators are responding for the investigation. No further details.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 AR21 AR35 BC10 BC12 BC14 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E288 E289 E298 E39 E88 E99 EA1 EM17 HR3 PH1 RA102 RA78 RA878 RA889 T39 T60 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0286; 06:27AM; 5420 N Nagle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3M4RITX; Sherman Oaks; Firefighters made good progress against the blaze and are rooting out fire between (in) the floors (1st and 2nd) and sections of the structure that are difficult to reach due to the roof collapse and burned out floor. LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section is responding for the investigation. The home appears to either be newly built or undergoing renovations and is not occupied. No injuries reported.; FS 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 AR21 BC10 BC12 BC14 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E288 E289 E298 E39 E88 E99 EA1 EM17 HR3 RA102 RA78 RA878 RA889 T39 T60 T78 T88 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart
